body_html: If you do have self attention as its own separate building block, the main thing I'd want included as an option is to properly deal with masking future time steps. It's one of the things that's easier to forget if you're implementing it yourself and unlike some other mistakes, won't hurt you during training (in fact it'll make you over estimate your performance).

body: If you do have self attention as its own separate building block, the main thing I'd want included as an option is to properly deal with masking future time steps. It's one of the things that's easier to forget if you're implementing it yourself and unlike some other mistakes, won't hurt you during training (in fact it'll make you over estimate your performance).
